action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to prohibit the exclusion of individuals from service on a District of Columbia jury on account of sexual orientation or gender identity.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2025.

section.header: Exclusion from District of Columbia juries on account of sexual orientation or gender identity prohibited

subsection.text: Section 11–1903, District of Columbia Official Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking A citizen and inserting (a) A citizen; and
by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subparagraph.text: pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition;
sexual orientation (defined as homosexuality, heterosexuality, or bisexuality) or gender identity; and
sex characteristics, including intersex traits; and

paragraph.text: when used with respect to an individual, includes—

subparagraph.text: the sex of another person with whom the individual is associated or has been associated; and
a perception or belief, even if inaccurate, concerning the sex of the individual.

subsection.text: Section 11–1910(c), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (c) The procedures and inserting (c)(1) The procedures; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

clause.text: pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition;
